message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product! It's a fantastic opportunity to get your hands on this unique item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,000. I think this is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $12,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you coming down to $9,000, but I'm still looking to pay a bit less.  I'm willing to pay $8,000 for the product.  What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to pay a bit less, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8,800. This is a great compromise, considering the product's value to you is $12,000. What do you think?
